text: Pavlina Khristova (born 6 October 1968) is a Bulgarian rower. She competed in the women's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Bulgaria Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Targovishte
title: Pavlina Khristova
